greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0)=1 and, for n>0, a(n)=a(Floor((n-1)/a[n-1]))+2.
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
maple: a[0]:=1: for n from 1 to 20000 do a[n]:=2+a[floor((n-1)/a[(n-1)])] end do: # _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 15 2017
xref: See A130147 for a related sequence.
results.author: _John W. Layman_, Aug 20 2007
